text:
Здравейте,

 

Моля, за вашето съдействие приложената проформа да бъде изплатена в днешния ден, поради условие на резервацията.

 

Поздрави,

Елена Ковачки

Ръководител „Администрация и Бек Офис“

Отдел „Търговия с природен газ“

Моб: +359 893 659 834

www.tibiel.com <http://www.tibiel.com/> 

ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД



 



 

From: Nafsika <info@nafsika.gr> 
Sent: Monday, September 9, 2024 12:18 PM
To: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>
Cc: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com>
Subject: Απ: hotel reservation 

 

Dear Elena ,

 

Thank you for your message.

 

Following our phone communication with Mr Karantzis ,

 

We have reserved 2 double rooms ( single occupancy )  for our mutual  guests :

 

Kiril Kirilov,

Tel: +359 896 797 444;

e-mail: kirilov.sofia@gmail.com <mailto:kirilov.sofia@gmail.com> 

 

Mr. Anton Valiov;

Tel: +359 884 762 876

e-mail: a.valyov@advice-expert.com <mailto:a.valyov@advice-expert.com> 

 

 

Check in : 12.09

 

Check out : 13.09

 

 

 

Corporate rate per room per  night :

 

115€ +3€ ( environmental fee ) | breakfast included 

 

 

Please note that final invoice can be printed after  guests' departure .

 

 

I have attached a proforma with all  the details  , let me know if there is any additional information you require.

 

We would kindly ask if is possible to proceed with the bank transfer up to tommorow  and  provide us with the bank deposit proof after the transaction. 

 

We remain at your disposal for any inquiries.

 

Kind regards ,

 

George Sovolos

 

Reservations department

 

6, Pellis str.
